name: Attack on Pants
description:
Help free the village from the oppression of wearing clothes. Make everyone lose their sanity until they join your naked rebellion and don't stop until everyone is on board.

Made for Ufeffjam 2 in roughly 48 hours over a few weeks, using a pixel art pack from wareya, with sounds and music from Nightingalle.

How to play:

- WASD/arrows to move, space to pick things up and throw them. (Alternatively try a controller (tested with Xbox series controller on Windows)

- Find villagers with lowish sanity, if they're running away, chase them down to convert them.

- Throw things at villagers who try to resist until they panic

- It'll be easier to make villagers panic the more of your followers there are nearby.

- Don't let your flow run out, watch out for the pants meter. It decreases over time and when you get punched, but recovers every time you get a new follower.

Game runs on the libre FTE Quakeworld engine, game code for modding is included game/src directory, I'm licensing the .qc and .src files under MIT license.
